creator: radu_coravu@sync.ro
text:
The following SVG file:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="800" height="800">
<text x="10" y="25" fill="navy" font-size="15" font-family="times">
It was the best of times.
</text>
</svg>

renders OK on windows but renders with white foreground and is invisible on Mac.

See this link for more details:
http://www.oxygenxml.com/forum/post14190.html?sid=5d387177b3680ad6b9d074b0cc2d6d9c#p14190

This is a known issue, please see bug 47917 for more information.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 47917 ***
creator: helder.magalhaes@gmail.com
